text: Andreas Johansson may refer to: * Andreas Johansson (footballer, born 1978), Swedish former footballer that most recently was playing for Djurgårdens IF * Andreas Johansson (footballer, born 1982), Swedish footballer playing for Halmstads BK * Andreas Johansson (ice hockey) (born 1973), Swedish hockey player * Andreas Johansson, drummer in Narnia * Andreas Johansson, bass guitarist in Cult of Luna
title: Andreas Johansson
